{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Deco M9 Plus |revision=(v1.0) |series=AC2200 |asin=B07D3X5PF3 |price=180 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |est_release_date=06/19/2018 |fcc_date=09/07/2017 |fcc_id=TE7M6 |ic_id=8853A-M6 |pcb_id=2050500911 |type=wireless router, wireless system, IoT hub |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE6515KZ, E065100; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE6515KZ, E065100; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE6515KZ, E065100; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE707LDL, E070704; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072;Q, QCA8072, 0VV, PU64823Y, U064800; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;PA5542, OUNR;2; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 6417T4;1; ,,, Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking Wireless SoCs for Zigbee and Thread; Silicon Labs;EFR32MG;EFR32, MG1B232GG, 1642C00BWK0;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, ZigBee, Bluetooth 4.1 LE, Alexa, IFTTT, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• 2x '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''AC2200'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2200 Smart Whole-Home Wi-Fi System}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Deco-M9-Plus.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Deco-M9-Plus}} *"2050500911" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device appears to be marketed as the Deco M9 Plus instead of as M6. :Bluetooth: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/csr8811 CSR8811] (BT 4.2) *[https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/alexa-compatibility/ ''Alexa Compatibility for TP-Link Wi-Fi products'' on '''TP-LINK'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-tp-link-deco-m9-plus ''TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus Review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.mbreviews.com/tp-link-deco-m9-plus-wifi-mesh-system-review/ ''TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus Review'' on '''MB|Reviews'''] (Spec.) ===See also=== :;[[TP-LINK Deco series]] • [[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M4R]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M5]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M6 v1.0]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus v1]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus v2]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus v2.2]] *[[TP-LINK Deco P7 v1.x]] *[[TP-LINK HC220-G1]] *[[TP-LINK M53]] __NOTOC__
